Code:
EXEC SQL  SELECT VALUE(COUNT(*)0)
FROM SEGUROS.V0SINI_LANCLOTE1
 
WHERE L.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO = :NUM_APOL_SINISTRO
  AND L.OPERACAO          = :OPERACAO
  AND C.FONTE             = L.FONTE
  AND C.NUM_LOTE          = L.NUM_LOTE
  AND C.SITUACAO_LOTE     <> 'C'
  AND H.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO = L.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO
  AND H.OCORHIST          = L.OCORHIST
  AND H.OPERACAO          = L.OPERACAO
  AND H.SITUACAO          <> '2'
/
 END SQL
